name: PCI DSS
description: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard

controls.title: A formal process for approving and testing all network connections and changes to firewall and router configurations
controls.description: Establish a formal process for approving and testing all network connections and changes to firewall and router configurations
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement a formal process for approving and testing all network connections and firewall/router changes.

controls.title: Current network diagram that identifies all connections between the cardholder data environment and other networks
controls.description: Maintain current network diagrams that identify all connections between the cardholder data environment and other networks
controls.implementationGuidance: Maintain accurate and current network diagrams showing all connections to the cardholder data environment.

controls.title: Current diagram that shows all cardholder data flows across systems and networks
controls.description: Maintain current diagrams that show all cardholder data flows across systems and networks
controls.implementationGuidance: Document and maintain current data flow diagrams for all cardholder data across systems and networks.

controls.title: Restrict inbound and outbound traffic to that which is necessary for the cardholder data environment
controls.description: Implement restrictions on inbound and outbound traffic to only that which is necessary for the cardholder data environment
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement firewall rules to restrict traffic to only what is necessary for the cardholder data environment.

controls.title: Secure and synchronize router configuration files
controls.description: Secure and synchronize router configuration files
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement security measures and synchronization procedures for router configuration files.

controls.title: Install perimeter firewalls between all wireless networks and the cardholder data environment
controls.description: Install perimeter firewalls between all wireless networks and the cardholder data environment
controls.implementationGuidance: Install and configure perimeter firewalls to isolate wireless networks from the cardholder data environment.

controls.title: Prohibit direct public access between the Internet and any system component in the cardholder data environment
controls.description: Prohibit direct public access between the Internet and any system component in the cardholder data environment
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement controls to prevent direct public access between the Internet and cardholder data environment components.

controls.title: Prohibit direct public access between the Internet and any system component in the cardholder data environment
controls.description: Prohibit direct public access between the Internet and any system component in the cardholder data environment
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement additional controls to prevent direct public access between the Internet and cardholder data environment components.

controls.title: Change Default Vendor-Supplied Passwords and Security Parameters
controls.description: Change default vendor-supplied passwords and security parameters
controls.implementationGuidance: Change all default passwords and security parameters before deploying systems to production.

controls.title: Develop Configuration Standards for All System Components
controls.description: Develop configuration standards for all system components
controls.implementationGuidance: Develop and document configuration standards for all system components in the cardholder data environment.

controls.title: Encrypt All Non-Console Administrative Access
controls.description: Encrypt all non-console administrative access using strong cryptography
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement strong encryption for all non-console administrative access to system components.

controls.title: Protect Stored Cardholder Data
controls.description: Protect stored cardholder data
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement strong encryption and access controls to protect stored cardholder data.

controls.title: Do Not Store Sensitive Authentication Data
controls.description: Do not store sensitive authentication data after authorization
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement controls to prevent storage of sensitive authentication data after authorization.

controls.title: Mask PAN When Displayed
controls.description: Mask PAN when displayed (the first six and last four digits are the maximum number of digits to be displayed)
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement PAN masking to show only the first six and last four digits when displayed.

controls.title: Render PAN Unreadable Anywhere It Is Stored
controls.description: Render PAN unreadable anywhere it is stored (including on portable digital media, backup media, and in logs)
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement encryption or other methods to render PAN unreadable in all storage locations.

controls.title: Use Strong Cryptography and Security Protocols
controls.description: Use strong cryptography and security protocols to safeguard sensitive cardholder data during transmission over open, public networks
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement strong cryptography and security protocols for all cardholder data transmission over public networks.

controls.title: Never Send Unencrypted PANs by End-User Messaging Technologies
controls.description: Never send unencrypted PANs by end-user messaging technologies
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement controls to prevent transmission of unencrypted PANs through end-user messaging technologies.

controls.title: Deploy Anti-Virus Software on All Systems
controls.description: Deploy anti-virus software on all systems commonly affected by malicious software
controls.implementationGuidance: Deploy and maintain anti-virus software on all systems that could be affected by malicious software.

controls.title: Ensure All Anti-Virus Programs Are Capable of Detecting, Removing, and Protecting Against All Known Types of Malicious Software
controls.description: Ensure all anti-virus programs are capable of detecting, removing, and protecting against all known types of malicious software
controls.implementationGuidance: Ensure anti-virus software has comprehensive capabilities for detecting, removing, and protecting against malicious software.

controls.title: Ensure Anti-Virus Mechanisms Are Actively Running
controls.description: Ensure anti-virus mechanisms are actively running and cannot be disabled or altered by users
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement controls to ensure anti-virus mechanisms are always active and cannot be disabled by users.

controls.title: Establish a Process to Identify Security Vulnerabilities
controls.description: Establish a process to identify security vulnerabilities, using reputable outside sources for security vulnerability information
controls.implementationGuidance: Establish a formal process for identifying security vulnerabilities using reputable external sources.

controls.title: Ensure That All System Components and Software Are Protected from Known Vulnerabilities
controls.description: Ensure that all system components and software are protected from known vulnerabilities by installing applicable vendor-supplied security patches
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement a process to ensure all system components are protected from known vulnerabilities through security patches.

controls.title: Develop Secure Applications and Systems
controls.description: Develop secure applications and systems in accordance with PCI DSS and industry best practices
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement secure development practices that comply with PCI DSS and industry best practices.
